item.title: Bash scripting to compare chat logs of an IRC channel
item.description: Table of Contents Summary Preliminary notes: Plan Simple case Including variables for url prefix, start id and end id Figuring out a larger range Implementing a simple conditional statement Implementing the for loop for a range > 500 Adding some functions and other minor streamlining Enabling the script to be called with parameters Comparing logs for range 9998683 to 1000000 Concluding remarks References

item.title: CFX Job scheduler
item.description: Scheduler-Psuedo-Algorithm Introduction Code On Github Presentation Wiki on Github This is a Python script for a portable, scalable job scheduler with multiple priorities - for ANSYS CFX simulations. The script was designed to be called every minute by an external scheduler program. In the practical case, the free version of the software System Scheduler was used to deploy the script successfully, for over 3 years, managing 2 computing clusters.
